description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nAshes to Ashes:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it afflicts the target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}. If the target already has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}, it afflicts all enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}.
name: Wildfire Ashes
